original_text: Israel's people were in the Sinai desert. The Lord gave the rules to Moses on Sinai mountain. That was on the day that the Lord spoke to the people. He told them that they should bring their offerings to him there.
korean_text: 여호와께서 시내 광야에서 이스라엘 자손에게 그 예물을 여호와께 드리라 명령하신 날에 시내 산에서 이같이 모세에게 명령하셨더라

sentences.original_text: Israel's people were in the Sinai desert.
The Lord gave the rules to Moses on Sinai mountain.
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 시내 산에서 모세에게 규칙을 주셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: that the Lord spoke to the people.
that they should bring their offerings to him there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그곳에서 그분께 제물을 가져와야 한다고 말입니다.
